channel.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 6
channel.description: # Backstory After reading the cracking attempts from the [previous thread](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-5/3022/), `edgyReggie` asked `DownerDanny` to take some time into researching further possible solutions to deter crackers. That _some time_ has now passed and `edgeS0ft` are ready to release their updated software _hoping_ that it will at least hold off the weaker pirates until `DownerDanny` can study and apply more methods... ## Difficulty #### Author Assigned Level: Wannabe #### Community Assigned Level: [poll type=regular] * Newbie * Wannabe * Hacker * Wizard * Guru [/poll] ---------- ## Goal * Your goal is to achieve the "full" version of the software, i.e. removing all nags that you see and unlocking all features of the program. * Your second goal is to ensure that your unlocked program works on different machines. * Your third (optional) goal is to generate a working name-serial pair if possible. * Bonus points to the most elegant solutions (minimal byte patching). ---------- ## Rules of Engagement Not really a rule but it would be a better learning experience if you disable all _anti-anti_ plugins. I'm not forcing this onto you but I'd recommend leaving them until later. ----- ## Research Material [details=DEFINITE SPOILERS IN HERE! Don't reveal unless you're really stuck!] * [Grazfather - Anti-Disassembly Techniques and Mitigation](https://grazfather.github.io/re/malware/ida/2016/09/18/Anti-Disassembly.html) * [MSDN - EnumWindows](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms633497(v=vs.85).aspx) [/details] ---------- ## Binary #### Preview (look and design may not be accurate): #### Version 2.2 revised version (bug fixes) [MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/file/p5awaouaj7rak74/NoREpls2.2.exe](http://www.mediafire.com/file/p5awaouaj7rak74/NoREpls2.2.exe) [VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/d3d8c6d8ff5d7733b531f0fb19329f6341fbb003e0e5854eb8ff56b9193e1b9d/analysis/1501149854/](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/d3d8c6d8ff5d7733b531f0fb19329f6341fbb003e0e5854eb8ff56b9193e1b9d/analysis/1501149854/) Good luck! :wink:

item.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 6
item.dc:creator: dtm
item.description:
rokups:

Any recommendations on reading material regarding reverse-engineering serial generation algorithm? I have a general idea of just going through serial check algorithm and adjusting serial values to ones that algorithm expects, but it would produce one serial and sounds inefficient. Is there a better way?

Sorry, I don’t have anything on that. I’d assume it just takes a lot of practice.

Read full topic

item.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 6
item.dc:creator: dtm
item.description:
Backstory

After reading the cracking attempts from the previous thread, edgyReggie asked DownerDanny to take some time into researching further possible solutions to deter crackers. That some time has now passed and edgeS0ft are ready to release their updated software hoping that it will at least hold off the weaker pirates until DownerDanny can study and apply more methods…

Difficulty

Author Assigned Level: Wannabe

Community Assigned Level:

Click to view the poll.

Goal

  • Your goal is to achieve the “full” version of the software, i.e. removing all nags that you see and unlocking all features of the program.
  • Your second goal is to ensure that your unlocked program works on different machines.
  • Your third (optional) goal is to generate a working name-serial pair if possible.
  • Bonus points to the most elegant solutions (minimal byte patching).

Rules of Engagement

Not really a rule but it would be a better learning experience if you disable all anti-anti plugins. I’m not forcing this onto you but I’d recommend leaving them until later.

Research Material

DEFINITE SPOILERS IN HERE! Don't reveal unless you're really stuck! (click for more details)

Binary

Preview (look and design may not be accurate):

Version 2.2 revised version (bug fixes)

MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/file/p5awaouaj7rak74/NoREpls2.2.exe

VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/d3d8c6d8ff5d7733b531f0fb19329f6341fbb003e0e5854eb8ff56b9193e1b9d/analysis/1501149854/

Good luck!

Read full topic
